explains: n. 活力，热情；生机，生命力
wordGroup: vigor and vitality 生机与活力

sentences.en: It was a performance of verve and vitality.
sentences.cn: 这是一场充满激情与活力的演出。

sentences.en: Without continued learning, graduates will lose their intellectual vitality.
sentences.cn: 如果不继续学习，毕业生们就会失去他们的思维活力。

sentences.en: An artificial language has no vitality.
